name: Evidence-based nursing practice
short_description:
Module 2 of EVIDENCE-BASED NURSING PRACTICE requires students to apply critical thinking skills as they analyze care bundles discussed throughout the 4-week course.This 2-part module designed for RN to BSN students examines key components of evidence-based nursing practice.  Module 1 covered the fundamentals of nursing research, evidence-based practice (EBP), and the five steps of the EBP method.  In Module 2, students utilize the 5-step process as they study and evaluate care bundle protocols designed to improve patient outcomes. 
Throughout the 4-week module, students are required to participate in online discussions and complete 2 application papers. The structure of each week utilizes a constructivist approach as students synthesize knowledge regarding EBP and care bundles.
The module provides an overview of evidence-based care bundles; increases students’ ability to analyze care bundles; and recognizes the significant role of care bundles in improving patient outcomes.
summary: A Module for RN to BSN Students
